title: Customer support
body: Was wondering if I could talk to the support team live?  I have an issue with my account I would like to talk to them in person, I have checked but I could not find an option for this. thank you for your time :)

replies.body: I was unable to play the game for a few minutes.. im the reason we won the early game and im the reason we won when i came back. so why would i get leaver buster? like if i left on purpose please fix this negative rating.
I didnâ€™t have any Bule Essence since I played for several game.why?

We'd like to hear from you!  Currently, the best way to reach our account team is through a support ticket.  If it's in regards to a recovery, filling out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) would be your best bet.  A specialist will individually be assigned to your case, and help the entire way through.  Reach out to us there, and we'll get back to you as soon as we can!
